indication: Memory loss, rule out Alzheimer’s disease
content:
Findings:
Cerebral Metabolism: Reduced FDG uptake in the parietotemporal lobes bilaterally, more prominent on the left side, consistent with Alzheimer’s disease.
Other Findings: No significant tracer uptake in extra-cerebral structures.
Background Activity: Normal tracer uptake in the basal ganglia and cerebellum.

Impression:
Findings suggestive of early Alzheimer’s disease.
Recommend clinical correlation and neurocognitive testing.
